tricks.title: Make an HTTP Request
tricks.description: Fetch data from an API using Net::HTTP.
tricks.code:
require 'net/http'
require 'json'

uri = URI('https://api.example.com/data')
response = Net::HTTP.get(uri)
data = JSON.parse(response)
puts data

tricks.title: Connect to SQLite
tricks.code:
require 'sqlite3'

db = SQLite3::Database.new('example.db')
db.execute('SELECT * FROM users') do |row|
    puts row.join(', ')
end
db.close

tricks.title: Use Regular Expressions
tricks.code:
text = 'Contact: user@example.com'
emails = text.scan(/\b[\w.-]+@[\w.-]+\.\w+\b/)
puts emails
